info.game_comments: Every clue was written by Harry Eisenberg, who had each category begin with the letter "H".

(1, 1).clue: By definition, a golfer who averages par for his game doesn't have one

(1, 2).clue: In the '20s, Americans created this word to replace the French "coiffure"
